caption:
“Put on the full armor of God.” — Ephesians 6:11

Reflection:
The soul is a battlefield, and faith its armor. Truth shields the heart; righteousness steadies the hand.

Commentary:
Paul’s words remind us that spiritual strength is defensive, not destructive — to guard the soul with virtue, not violence.
